height="10" title="9" alt="9"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c1">0%</td><td class="bar" id="d1"/><td class="ctr2" id="e1">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f1">1</td><td class="ctr2" id="g1">1</td><td PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" class="el_source">HealthCheck.java</span></div><h1>HealthCheck.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.health;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.HttpResponse;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.RequestHandler;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

import java.lang.management.ManagementFactory;
import java.lang.management.MemoryMXBean;
import java.lang.management.RuntimeMXBean;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Health check endpoint for monitoring and load balancers.
 * Returns application health status, version info, and system metrics.
 */
public class HealthCheck implements RequestHandler {
<span class="nc" id="L20">    private static final ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();</span>
    private final String appName;
    private final String appVersion;
<span class="nc" id="L23">    private final List&lt;HealthCheckProvider&gt; customChecks = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>

<span class="nc" id="L25">    public HealthCheck(String appName, String appVersion) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L26">        this.appName = appName;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L27">        this.appVersion = appVersion;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L28">    }</span>

    /**
     * Register a custom health check provider.
     *
     * @param provider Custom health check logic
     */
    public void addHealthCheckProvider(HealthCheckProvider provider) {
<span class="nc" id="L36">        customChecks.add(provider);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L37">    }</span>

    @Override
    public HttpResponse handle(HttpServletRequest request) throws Exception {
<span class="nc" id="L41">        ObjectNode health = objectMapper.createObjectNode();</span>

        // Basic info
<span class="nc" id="L44">        health.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;UP&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L45">        health.put(&quot;application&quot;, appName);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L46">        health.put(&quot;version&quot;, appVersion);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L47">        health.put(&quot;timestamp&quot;, System.currentTimeMillis());</span>

        // Runtime info
<span class="nc" id="L50">        RuntimeMXBean runtimeBean = ManagementFactory.getRuntimeMXBean();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L51">        ObjectNode runtime = health.putObject(&quot;runtime&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L52">        runtime.put(&quot;uptime&quot;, runtimeBean.getUptime());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L53">        runtime.put(&quot;startTime&quot;, runtimeBean.getStartTime());</span>

        // Memory info
<span class="nc" id="L56">        MemoryMXBean memoryBean = ManagementFactory.getMemoryMXBean();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L57">        ObjectNode memory = health.putObject(&quot;memory&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L58">        memory.put(&quot;heapUsed&quot;, memoryBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getUsed());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L59">        memory.put(&quot;heapMax&quot;, memoryBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getMax());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L60">        memory.put(&quot;heapCommitted&quot;, memoryBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getCommitted());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L61">        memory.put(&quot;heapUsagePercent&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">                (memoryBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getUsed() * 100.0) / memoryBean.getHeapMemoryUsage().getMax());</span>

        // System info
<span class="nc" id="L65">        ObjectNode system = health.putObject(&quot;system&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">        system.put(&quot;availableProcessors&quot;, Runtime.getRuntime().availableProcessors());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">        system.put(&quot;totalMemory&quot;, Runtime.getRuntime().totalMemory());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">        system.put(&quot;freeMemory&quot;, Runtime.getRuntime().freeMemory());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L69">        system.put(&quot;maxMemory&quot;, Runtime.getRuntime().maxMemory());</span>

        // Custom health checks
<span class="nc" id="L72">        boolean allHealthy = true;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">        ObjectNode checks = health.putObject(&quot;checks&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L74" title="All 2 branches missed.">        for (HealthCheckProvider provider : customChecks) {</span>
            try {
<span class="nc" id="L76">                HealthCheckResult result = provider.check();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L77">                ObjectNode checkNode = checks.putObject(result.getName());</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L78" title="All 2 branches missed.">                checkNode.put(&quot;status&quot;, result.isHealthy() ? &quot;UP&quot; : &quot;DOWN&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L79" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (result.getMessage() != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L80">                    checkNode.put(&quot;message&quot;, result.getMessage());</span>
                }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L82" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (result.getDetails() != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L83">                    checkNode.set(&quot;details&quot;, objectMapper.valueToTree(result.getDetails()));</span>
                }

<span class="nc bnc" id="L86" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (!result.isHealthy()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L87">                    allHealthy = false;</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L89">            } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L90">                ObjectNode checkNode = checks.putObject(provider.getName());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L91">                checkNode.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;DOWN&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L92">                checkNode.put(&quot;error&quot;, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L93">                allHealthy = false;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L94">            }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L95">        }</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L97" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (!allHealthy) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L98">            health.put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;DEGRADED&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L101">        String json = objectMapper.writerWithDefaultPrettyPrinter().writeValueAsString(health);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L102">        return HttpResponse.ok(json, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Interface for custom health check providers.
     */
    public interface HealthCheckProvider {
        /**
         * Gets the name of this health check.
         */
        String getName();

        /**
         * Performs the health check.
         *
         * @return Health check result
         */
        HealthCheckResult check();
    }

    /**
     * Result of a health check.
     */
    public static class HealthCheckResult {
        private final String name;
        private final boolean healthy;
        private final String message;
        private final Object details;

        public HealthCheckResult(String name, boolean healthy) {
<span class="nc" id="L132">            this(name, healthy, null, null);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L133">        }</span>

        public HealthCheckResult(String name, boolean healthy, String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L136">            this(name, healthy, message, null);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L137">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L139">        public HealthCheckResult(String name, boolean healthy, String message, Object details) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L140">            this.name = name;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L141">            this.healthy = healthy;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L142">            this.message = message;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L143">            this.details = details;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L144">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L146">        public String getName() { return name; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L147">        public boolean isHealthy() { return healthy; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L148">        public String getMessage() { return message; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L149">        public Object getDetails() { return details; }</span>
    }
}

class="bar" id="b17"><img src="../jacoco-resources/redbar.gif" width="12" height="10" title="3" alt="3"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c17">0%</td><td class="bar" id="d17"/><td class="ctr2" id="k22">1</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>ErrorResponse.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.error</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ErrorResponse.java</span></div><h1>ErrorResponse.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.error;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;

import java.util.Map;

/**
 * Standardized JSON error response format.
 */
@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
public class ErrorResponse {
<span class="nc" id="L14">    private static final ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    private String error;
    private String message;
    private String errorCode;
    private Integer statusCode;
    private String path;
    private Long timestamp;
    private Map&lt;String, Object&gt; details;

<span class="nc" id="L24">    private ErrorResponse() {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L25">        this.timestamp = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L26">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates an error response.
     *
     * @param error Short error identifier (e.g., &quot;validation_failed&quot;)
     * @param message Human-readable error message
     * @return Builder for additional fields
     */
    public static ErrorResponse create(String error, String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L36">        ErrorResponse response = new ErrorResponse();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L37">        response.error = error;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L38">        response.message = message;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L39">        return response;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a validation error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse validationError(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L46">        return create(&quot;validation_failed&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L47">                .withStatusCode(400);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates an authentication error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse authenticationError(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L54">        return create(&quot;authentication_failed&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">                .withStatusCode(401);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates an authorization error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse authorizationError(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L62">        return create(&quot;authorization_failed&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L63">                .withStatusCode(403);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a not found error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse notFound(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L70">        return create(&quot;not_found&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L71">                .withStatusCode(404);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a server error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse serverError(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L78">        return create(&quot;internal_server_error&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">                .withStatusCode(500);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a bad request error.
     */
    public static ErrorResponse badRequest(String message) {
<span class="nc" id="L86">        return create(&quot;bad_request&quot;, message)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L87">                .withStatusCode(400);</span>
    }

    public ErrorResponse withErrorCode(String errorCode) {
<span class="nc" id="L91">        this.errorCode = errorCode;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L92">        return this;</span>
    }

    public ErrorResponse withStatusCode(int statusCode) {
<span class="nc" id="L96">        this.statusCode = statusCode;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L97">        return this;</span>
    }

    public ErrorResponse withPath(String path) {
<span class="nc" id="L101">        this.path = path;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L102">        return this;</span>
    }

    public ErrorResponse withDetails(Map&lt;String, Object&gt; details) {
<span class="nc" id="L106">        this.details = details;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">        return this;</span>
    }

    // Getters
<span class="nc" id="L111">    public String getError() { return error; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L112">    public String getMessage() { return message; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L113">    public String getErrorCode() { return errorCode; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L114">    public Integer getStatusCode() { return statusCode; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L115">    public String getPath() { return path; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L116">    public Long getTimestamp() { return timestamp; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L117">    public Map&lt;String, Object&gt; getDetails() { return details; }</span>

    /**
     * Converts to JSON string.
     */
    public String toJson() {
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L124">            return objectMapper.writeValueAsString(this);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L125">        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {</span>
            // Fallback to simple JSON if serialization fails
<span class="nc" id="L127">            return String.format(&quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;%s\&quot;,\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;%s\&quot;,\&quot;timestamp\&quot;:%d}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L128">                    escapeJson(error), escapeJson(message), timestamp);</span>
        }
    }

    private String escapeJson(String str) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L133" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (str == null) return &quot;&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L134">        return str.replace(&quot;\\&quot;, &quot;\\\\&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L135">                .replace(&quot;\&quot;&quot;, &quot;\\\&quot;&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L136">                .replace(&quot;\n&quot;, &quot;\\n&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L137">                .replace(&quot;\r&quot;, &quot;\\r&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L138">                .replace(&quot;\t&quot;, &quot;\\t&quot;);</span>
    }

    @Override
    public String toString() {
<span class="nc" id="L143">        return toJson();</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>ErrorHandler.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.error</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ErrorHandler.java</span></div><h1>ErrorHandler.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.error;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.UUID;

/**
 * Centralized error handling for addon servlet.
 *
 * Provides safe error responses while logging full details server-side.
 * Prevents information disclosure and ensures consistent error formatting.
 */
<span class="nc" id="L17">public class ErrorHandler {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L18">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ErrorHandler.class);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L19">    private static final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    /**
     * Error categories for classification and safe client responses.
     */
<span class="fc" id="L24">    public enum ErrorCategory {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L25">        VALIDATION(&quot;Validation failed&quot;, 400),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L26">        NOT_FOUND(&quot;Resource not found&quot;, 404),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L27">        AUTHENTICATION(&quot;Authentication required&quot;, 401),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">        RATE_LIMIT(&quot;Rate limit exceeded&quot;, 429),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">        SERVER_ERROR(&quot;Internal server error&quot;, 500),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">        DEPENDENCY_ERROR(&quot;Service dependency error&quot;, 502);</span>

        private final String clientMessage;
        private final int httpStatus;

<span class="fc" id="L35">        ErrorCategory(String clientMessage, int httpStatus) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">            this.clientMessage = clientMessage;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">            this.httpStatus = httpStatus;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">        }</span>

        public String getClientMessage() {
<span class="fc" id="L41">            return clientMessage;</span>
        }

        public int getHttpStatus() {
<span class="fc" id="L45">            return httpStatus;</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Creates a safe error response from an exception.
     *
     * Full exception details are logged server-side with correlation ID.
     * Client receives generic message with error code for tracking.
     *
     * @param exception the exception that occurred
     * @param category the error category for classification
     * @param context optional context (e.g., &quot;webhook handler&quot;, &quot;token lookup&quot;)
     * @return JSON error response safe for client
     */
    public static ErrorResponse handleException(Exception exception, ErrorCategory category, String context) {
<span class="fc" id="L61">        String errorId = UUID.randomUUID().toString();</span>

        // Log full details server-side with correlation ID
<span class="fc bfc" id="L64" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (category == ErrorCategory.SERVER_ERROR) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L65">            logger.error(&quot;Error [{}] in {}: {}&quot;, errorId, context, exception.getMessage(), exception);</span>
        } else {
<span class="fc" id="L67">            logger.warn(&quot;Error [{}] in {}: {}&quot;, errorId, context, exception.getMessage(), exception);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L70">        ObjectNode response = mapper.createObjectNode();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">        response.put(&quot;error&quot;, category.name().toLowerCase());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">        response.put(&quot;message&quot;, category.getClientMessage());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L73">        response.put(&quot;errorId&quot;, errorId);  // For support/debugging</span>

        // Add specific error details for validation errors only
<span class="fc bfc" id="L76" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (category == ErrorCategory.VALIDATION &amp;&amp; exception instanceof ValidationException) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L77">            response.put(&quot;details&quot;, ((ValidationException) exception).getValidationMessage());</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L80">        return new ErrorResponse(</span>
<span class="fc" id="L81">            category.getHttpStatus(),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L82">            response.toString(),</span>
            &quot;application/json&quot;
        );
    }

    /**
     * Creates a validation error response.
     *
     * @param message the validation error message (safe for client)
     * @param context the operation context for logging
     * @return JSON error response
     */
    public static ErrorResponse validationError(String message, String context) {
<span class="fc" id="L95">        logger.warn(&quot;Validation error in {}: {}&quot;, context, message);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L97">        ObjectNode response = mapper.createObjectNode();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L98">        response.put(&quot;error&quot;, &quot;validation_failed&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L99">        response.put(&quot;message&quot;, message);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L101">        return new ErrorResponse(400, response.toString(), &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a safe error response for unknown exceptions.
     *
     * Hides implementation details while logging everything.
     *
     * @param exception the unexpected exception
     * @param context the operation context
     * @return generic error response
     */
    public static ErrorResponse unknownError(Exception exception, String context) {
<span class="fc" id="L114">        return handleException(exception, ErrorCategory.SERVER_ERROR, context);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a JSON error response.
     *
     * @param statusCode HTTP status code
     * @param message client-safe error message
     * @return JSON error response
     */
    public static ErrorResponse jsonError(int statusCode, String message) {
<span class="fc" id="L125">        ObjectNode response = mapper.createObjectNode();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L126">        response.put(&quot;message&quot;, message);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L127">        return new ErrorResponse(statusCode, response.toString(), &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Safely extracts error message from exception, hiding sensitive details.
     *
     * @param exception the exception
     * @return safe error message
     */
    public static String getSafeMessage(Exception exception) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L137" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (exception instanceof ValidationException) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L138">            return ((ValidationException) exception).getValidationMessage();</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L141">        String message = exception.getMessage();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L142" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (message == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L143">            return &quot;An error occurred&quot;;</span>
        }

        // Hide sensitive details in message
<span class="fc" id="L147">        message = message.replace(&quot;SQLException&quot;, &quot;Database error&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L148">                        .replace(&quot;Connection refused&quot;, &quot;Service unavailable&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L149">                        .replace(&quot;password&quot;, &quot;***&quot;);</span>

        // Truncate if too long
<span class="fc bfc" id="L152" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (message.length() &gt; 200) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L153">            message = message.substring(0, 197) + &quot;...&quot;;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L156">        return message;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Custom validation exception for clearer error classification.
     */
    public static class ValidationException extends Exception {
        private final String validationMessage;

        public ValidationException(String validationMessage) {
<span class="fc" id="L166">            super(validationMessage);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L167">            this.validationMessage = validationMessage;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L168">        }</span>

        public String getValidationMessage() {
<span class="fc" id="L171">            return validationMessage;</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Error response data transfer object.
     */
    public static class ErrorResponse {
        private final int statusCode;
        private final String body;
        private final String contentType;

<span class="fc" id="L183">        public ErrorResponse(int statusCode, String body, String contentType) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L184">            this.statusCode = statusCode;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L185">            this.body = body;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L186">            this.contentType = contentType;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L187">        }</span>

        public int getStatusCode() {
<span class="fc" id="L190">            return statusCode;</span>
        }

        public String getBody() {
<span class="fc" id="L194">            return body;</span>
        }

        public String getContentType() {
<span class="fc" id="L198">            return contentType;</span>
        }
    }
}
